summary.span: Содержит классы, предназначенные для поддержки взаимодействия элементов управления Windows Forms и WPF.

span.span: Contains classes that support interoperation of Windows Forms and WPF controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Пространство имен содержит классы, обеспечивающие взаимодействие между [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] и [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] технологий.The namespace contains classes that enable interoperation between the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] technologies. При использовании классов, вы можете разместить [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] элементов управления в [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] страниц, и [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] элементов в [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-приложений на основе.When you use classes, you can host [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] controls on [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] pages, and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elements in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based applications. Ключевыми классами, реализующими возможности взаимодействия, и .The two key classes that implement interoperation capabilities are and . Выбор используемого класса зависит от реализации элемента управления.Which class you use depends on your control implementation: - Используйте класса, когда необходимо использовать [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] управления [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] страницы.Use the class when you must use a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control on a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] page. - Используйте класса, когда необходимо использовать [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] элемент в [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-приложения на основе.Use the class when you must use a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element in a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based application.
